title: Hand Scrubber Polisher HD-15P
description: The Dynaclean HD-15P is a powerful and portable battery-operated hand scrubber designed for efficient cleaning across multiple surfaces. Its ergonomic dual-handle design and 350 RPM brush speed ensure deep, uniform cleaning on staircases, furniture, and hard floors. With a fast-charging lithium battery, this compact scrubber offers up to 30 minutes of continuous cleaning, making it ideal for both residential and industrial use. The HD-15 delivers unmatched performance, durability, and convenience — the ultimate solution for effortless cleaning anytime, anywhere.
keyFeatures: Powerful Performance – 1060W motor delivers deep and efficient cleaning results with 350 RPM brush speed.
Cordless & Portable – Battery-operated design allows freedom of movement and flexibility during cleaning.
Fast Charging & Long Runtime – Fully charges in just 45 minutes for up to 30 minutes of continuous use.
Lightweight & Ergonomic – Weighs only 5.5 kg, ensuring comfort and reducing fatigue during extended use.
Single-Hand Operation – Can be operated easily with one hand when the extension handle is detached.
Adjustable Handle – Extendable handle (110 cm – 137 cm) enables cleaning of high and hard-to-reach areas.
Versatile Cleaning Options – Includes 18 cm brush and 14.5 cm pad holder for diverse cleaning applications.
Compact & Space-Saving – Easy to transport and store, ideal for both home and professional cleaning tasks.
User-Friendly Controls – Integrated handle controls for seamless operation even when extended.
